title: 4 Pieces Click Clack Sofa Bed Cover 3 Seater, Quilted Convertible Folding Cover with 2 Removable Armrests and 1 Holders Covers (Grey)
description: What’s the characteristics of the folding futon cover?
water resistant / slip resistant / washable / anti-fading / breathable / soft silent.
water resistant / slip resistant / washable / anti-fading / breathable / soft silent.
suitable for most kinds of sofa bed and all seasons. Dirt-resistant and does not hurt the sofa.
suitable for most kinds of sofa bed and all seasons. Dirt-resistant and does not hurt the sofa.

Please follow the instruction chart to measure your furniture. Width of the sofa (distance from left to right), height of the backrest, height and depth of the seat cushions (distance from front to back). Please also check if the 2 armrest pillows are removable.
How many pieces will I receive?
The furniture protector is sold in set. Package Includes 4 parts: 1pc main seat sofa cover, 2 pcs removable armrest covers, 1pc cup holder cover
There is a slight difference between the color of the picture and the color of the real object due to different display problems and lighting problems
